Class BaseAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • ITC322A1.BaseAccount

    public abstract class BaseAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BaseAccount>
    An abstract class to represent a basic Bank Account ITC322 Assignment 1 Task 1
    Author:
    Sean Matkovich, 11187033

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public abstract boolean deposit(double amount)
        Makes a deposit. Implementations will at least verify the amount is positive before making the deposit.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit
        Returns:
        true if positive amount deposited is realized as changes to balance of account; otherwise false.
